listing.listing_description: Bring the whole group on a Vail Valley ski holiday to Wayne Creek Road. With spacious interiors designed for entertaining and five bedrooms, this Beaver Creek Village vacation rental can welcome parties of up to ten friends or (almost) the whole extended family. Even better, it’s a 10-minute drive or less to skiing, shopping, dining and more.On sunny days, gather outside for dinner from the barbecue or a soak in the private al-fresco hot tub. In cooler weather, cozy up indoors by the gas fireplace, wet bar, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. Whether you’re a skier, boarder, biker or golfer, you’ll be ready for the next adventure thanks to the villa’s laundry facilities.While its architecture is contemporary, Wayne Creek Road uses river-stone accents and exposed wood beams to nod to traditional mountain-lodge style. Soaring ceilings and oversized windows fill the open-concept great room with light and views of the surrounding Colorado peaks, making it an inviting place to stretch out in the sitting area, catch up around the dining table for ten or satisfy appetites in a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.This luxury property has three bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom with a honeymoon-suite-worthy steam shower and jetted tub. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs.Your stay at Wayne Creek Road includes an on-call shuttle service. You can plan on a 4-minute drive to Beaver Creek Ski Area, the nearest slopes, and a 10-minute drive or less to shopping and dining in Beaver Creek Village and the town of Avon or, for warm-weather visitors, Beaver Creek Golf Club and EagleVail Golf Club. If you’d like more variety in your skiing, it’s less than 15 minutes to two other resorts.Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover the luxury side of Ski Town USA at Piney Mountain. Part of the exceptional One Steamboat Place resort in Steamboat Springs, this well-appointed private residence offers the comfort and flexibility of a home in a first-class setting. Take advantage of the resort amenities, seasonal shuttle and ski-in, ski-out location for an exceptional winter holiday in Colorado.Guests of Piney Mountain are invited to use the shared pool, hot tubs, fitness center, wine cellar and tasting room at One Steamboat Place. Let the kids make friends in the resort’s Little Tykes room while the grown-ups book a treatment at the renowned spa, or gather as a family in the games room or lounges. If you’d prefer to entertain in private, the villa has its own deck with a gas grill and a spacious great room overlooking the pool area and valley.Rich colors, natural textures and luxe fabrics define the One Steamboat Place look, and the interiors of Piney Mountain are no exception. Cozy up to the gas fireplace and television in one of the leather armchairs in the living room, or sit down for a special occasion at chairs with beautiful nailhead details in the adjacent dining area. Not only is the open-plan kitchen fully equipped, it features high-end appliances and cheerful, colorful cabinets.This Steamboat Springs vacation rental can accommodate up to ten guests in four comfortable bedrooms. There are two with king beds and en-suite bathrooms perfect for couples, and two with double beds, bunk beds and shared bathrooms where kids will want to stay.Not only does Steamboat Springs have some of the best skiing in the country, it also has a lively downtown and hot springs you can still visit. During the winter, put on your skis for the 1-minute trip to the Steamboat gondola at Steamboat Ski Resort; in the summer, pack your clubs for the short drive to the nearest golf course. Old Town Steamboat Springs, 3 miles away, offer several pools and even slides, while Strawberry Park Hot Springs, 10 miles away, are great for a honeymoon-style soak and stargazing amid the natural rock formations.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: It’s almost all in the name at Modern Farmhouse. Of course, there’s the villa’s rustic-chic interiors, featured in several magazines and filled with European antiques. But what’s not in the name is its incredible setting on a private acre overlooking the Napa Valley Reserve vineyards and a great location in St. Helena that’s within walking distance of the luxury Meadowood resort.Nestled into a grove, Modern Farmhouse opens to a shaded veranda with vineyard and mountain views and lounging and dining areas. There’s a pool at one end of the house, a hot tub at the other and a gravel path leading to an al-fresco entertaining area with a built-in bench, fountain and fireplace.Taking inspiration from traditional farmhouses, this California vacation rental has a breezy shotgun-style layout with a central great room. The property is owned—and was recently renovated by—an interior designer and the owner of a catering and event company, and it’s evident in the antique furnishings and fully equipped gourmet kitchen. Bring a book to one of the sofas carefully positioned to look out at the vineyards, or pick a bottle from the glass-fronted wine fridge to open around the stately dining table.The bedrooms, positioned on either side of the great room to overlook the pool and hot tub, are bright and airy private retreats. Both have queen beds and and the "master" has an en-suite bathroom. The bedrooms have Egyptian cotton linens, graceful antique accent pieces and trendy metal-edged French doors.Whether you’re spending a family holiday, a getaway with friends or a relaxed honeymoon in the Napa and Sonoma area, Modern Farmhouse puts you close to some of the region’s best things to see and do. Book a round of golf—or a spa appointment—at Meadowood, walk to a tasting at the nearest vineyard or make the short drive into downtown St. Helena for a look at its charming main street or a meal at one of its locally owned restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a gem of a property in an iconic neighborhood at Classic Mid-Century. Perched in the Bird Streets area of Hollywood with views over Los Angeles to the Pacific Ocean, this mod vacation rental has been lovingly updated to meet twenty-first-century standards of luxury. Soak in the California sun from the resort-worthy outdoor entertaining areas, or use the three-bedroom villa as a base for shopping, dining and sightseeing.Classic Mid-Century opens to a private terrace and backyard—and panoramic vistas of the city. Stretch out on one of the sleek sunbeds, take a swim in the free-form pool and heat up the barbecue as the sun begins to sink toward the Pacific. A firepit and lounge area make a cozy spot to gather in the evenings, and a heat lamp next to the hot tub will keep you toasty while getting in and out.Glass walls, an angled roof and smooth concrete forms link the outdoor living areas with the indoor ones. Soft area rugs, clean-lined sofas in neutral tones and low wood tables form a subtly stylish backdrop for whimsical contemporary art in the two-level sitting area, and in the dining area, graceful Cherner chairs and a glass-topped table are flooded with light from a bank of windows. There’s additional seating at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.The three bedrooms at Classic Mid-Century are large enough for a family holiday or vacation with friends, yet small enough for a honeymoon or other romantic getaway. The master suite has a king bed and en-suite bathroom and opens to the pool terrace, and the other two bedrooms have queen beds and share a bathroom.Though the villa’s city views make you feel like you’re above the urban bustle, Classic Mid-Century is less than 10 miles from many L.A. must-sees and less than 25 miles from some of the area’s most popular beaches. Spend an afternoon shopping on Rodeo Drive or at The Grove, browsing the collection at the Getty Center or teeing off at the Wilson & Harding Golf Course. If you’re traveling with the kids, bring them out for thrills at Universal Studios or oceanfront fun on the piers at Santa Monica Beach or Malibu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-002856

listing.listing_description: The Wolf Mountain suite at One Steamboat Place provides an ideal sanctuary and maximal convenience for enjoying a Rocky Mountain ski vacation with family and friends. With four bedrooms accommodating ten people, this luxury vacation rental includes access to world-class lodge amenities literally steps from the Steamboat Gondola.Wolf Mountain's open-plan living area features tall glass doors gazing out on Steamboat vistas, opening to a private outdoor patio with Viking grill. In the lounge, a deluxe couch and thick leather armchairs surround the central stone hearth, with its flat screen television and wood-burning fireplace, perfect for keeping toasty at night. Beside the lounge, the beautiful wooden dining table seats ten, while the fully equipped kitchen with Viking appliances includes a breakfast bar for three. The suite also includes an iMac computer with high-speed WiFi, and both air conditioning and heating for keeping cozy any time of year.The bedrooms are ideal for sweet rest and private quiet time. On one side of the suite, the master bedroom features a king size bed, large windows, a stone hearth with gas fireplace, a flat screen television, and a comfy armchair. The ensuite bathroom includes a stand-alone steam shower and jetted tub. On the other side of the suite, the guest master has a king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The third bedroom has a king bed, while the fourth has two queens, and both have ensuite bathrooms with shower/tub combo.Guests at One Steamboat Place enjoy access to its top-shelf mountain lodge offerings. Savor a well-earned soak in the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, and relax in the classic Great Room, with its massive stone fireplace and mountain views. There's also a game parlor and a Little Tykes Room for kids.For skiing and enjoying all of Steamboat's delights, your location is unparalleled. To hit the slopes in the morning, you're just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. For fine, Rocky Mountain golf, drive a few minutes to Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And if your body aches from conquering the slopes, let the mountains be your spa at Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, just ten miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the pristine surroundings of Los Angeles’ only oceanside resort. Terranea Retreat is one of the few three-bedroom villas on this vast 102 acre property that features front row views of both verdant fairways and the Pacific Ocean. The villa was only recently built, in 2008, and houses a wealth of high-end amenities, with access to countless five-star shared facilities.Terranea Retreat seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living, and nearly every room opens to spacious exterior areas. The entry courtyard is loaded with charm and its cozy furniture surrounds a lovely outdoor fireplace. The lanai has a shaded table and hot tub, both ideal places to relax and enjoy stunning panoramic views and sunsets. A walk around the resort will reveal all the shared amenities available to you: swimming pools, a fitness center, an award-winning spa, restaurants, cafés, hiking trails and more.Beautiful arched windows throw light on the elegant contemporary interior. Vaulted beam ceilings and hardwood floors create a sense of warmth while the great room’s modern furnishings contribute to an ambiance of sophistication. You’ll love getting creative in the chef’s kitchen on state of the art appliances and smooth natural stone surfaces. After a long day, ease into a comfortable living room sofa and watch a movie on the flatscreen, as flames dance in the fireplace below.The Master bedroom features a King bed that looks out to the ocean. This expansive suite houses a separate dressing room, desk and a spa-inspired en-suite with dual vanities, bathtub and shower. The second bedroom has two Queen size beds, while the remaining room has a King size bed and each holds its own well-appointed en-suite. All bedrooms are air conditioned and include a television.Terranea Resort is nestled upon a slice of paradise called Rancho Palos Verdes Peninsula, just South of Los Angeles. It’s a quick hike to the iconic Point Vicente Lighthouse and there are plenty of picturesque spots to discover nearby. The property is a great jumping off point for day trips into the city, while the beaches and attractive seaside towns of Orange County are close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its breath-taking mountain views of Steamboat Springs, this Colorado luxury home is the finest ski in, ski out vacation home in the Rocky Mountains. It offers all the high-end amenities and services (http://www.steamboatluxe.com/amenities.html) of a five-star hotel – such as a personal concierge, in-home spa services, and catered meals – with the comfort, sophistication and space of a modern mountain home.When you take your first step into the grand, vaulted entry of this luxury home rental, you’ll be struck by its beauty. Tremendous care and attention have been given to the finest details in the home, from the lofty windows with striking views, to the sophisticated, yet comfy, décor, to the wonderful flow of space – ideal for entertaining or escaping.The Over The Edge Home is undoubtedly Colorado's finest ski-in, ski out home available for rental. This newly constructed home is nestled high alongside Steamboat's legendary Mt. Werner, offering guests over 10,000 square feet of living space. Perfect for large families, corporate retreats or just a group of friends, we have no doubt that you will find our wonderful mountain retreat exceeds all of your expectations.A stunning architectural achievement, this spectacular 7 bedroom, 7.5 bath home boasts an incredible facade of stone block, field stone and mahogany that blend seamlessly into the mountainside landscape. Once inside, guests enjoy a decor designed by TRH interiors, known internationally for their work with Ritz Carlton Club properties around the world.We have spared no expense to provide our guests with every amenity they could possibly desire. The home boasts a gourmet kitchen equipped with Wolf and Subzero appliances that is perfect for both Mom's cooking or the gourmet chef we will be glad to set up for you. The design of the home allows for large dinner parties where friends remain connected and seating 24 comfortably at either of our two dining areas. Around the corner, but on the same floor, is a fully equipped bar with pool table, shuffleboard table, two large screen plasma television's, poker table and beautiful stone fireplace. Just plug in your I-pod when you arrive you can access your own music and playlists throughout the house.Downstairs guests will find a comfortable den with 52 inch Plasma television, video games (both Wii and X-Box) and Blu-Ray DVD for a great place to relax after a long day on the slopes. Open another door and you will find a real movie theater, equipped with 12 leather seats and room for more on the floor, Apple TV, Blu-Ray DVD and HD cable television. The room is perfect for a movie night or watching a ball game during your stay. You'll never want to leave the home.On Colorado's warm afternoons, our guests can enjoy three large decks, one off the lower level, one off the main living area and a spectacular rooftop deck with fireplace and heated deck for year round enjoyment. Lastly, when bedtime arrives you can relax in one of the 7 beautifully decorated bedrooms and 7 wonderful baths. The home boasts three master suites (perfect for three families!) each with king bed. The other rooms can be set-up for maximum comfort and convenience.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy resort-style luxury and the warmth of a family home at the expansive Chateau du Sureau. This beautifully appointed seven-bedroom vacation rental has amenities ranging from a heated driveway to a home theater, all rendered in classic mountain-lodge style. Even better, its Deer Crest location gives you ski-in, ski-out access to Deer Valley Resort.The chateau makes it easy to relax after a day on the slopes with a home theater, wet bar and sauna, as well as high-tech features such as a Sonos sound system, smart TV and Wi-Fi. For your convenience, there’s a mudroom with ski storage and an elevator to whisk you from one level to another. And for warmer weather, there are private outdoor living areas with a hot tub, barbecue and firepit.Drawing inspiration from the rugged Utah landscape, the chateau uses timber and stone to create imposing living spaces. At its heart is an open-concept great room with a sitting area laid out around a fireplace, a dining table for eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a generous breakfast bar.The villa’s seven bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to twenty on holiday together. There are six bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own jetted tub, fireplace and balcony, and one bedroom with two bunk beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Chateau du Sureau is slopeside to the Mountaineer ski run at Deer Valley Resort, meaning you can put on your skis and step outside to start your day on the mountain. It’s also a short drive from the resort base, as well as shopping and dining on Park City’s historic Main Street. If your trip is planned for the summer, you’ll find several golf courses within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to Clifton Lodge, a stunning alpine chalet that imposes a presence of natural beauty through relentless innovation. The structure of Clifton Lodge displays a masterpiece of environmentally conscious craftsmanship with fallen Montana timbers of pine and spruce. A quintessential, western log home with luxurious style and an ambience that radiates classic mountain comfort, Clifton Lodge is not just a house—it is a lifestyle!The en-suite bathroom in the Clifton Suite is a magnificent thirty feet in length and comprises vaulted ceilings, custom pine cabinetry, slate floors, double vanity, oversized mirrors, a jetted tub and an enormous shower with three sides of glass, dual shower heads and massager. The shower transforms into a steam room, making it a wonderfully private and relaxing escape. Enjoy all the comforts of home including a dining area for ten, gas wood stove, television, DVD player, Wi-Fi, fireplace, mudroom, den with bar sink and indoor/outdoor surround sound to keep the good times rolling.Clifton Lodge represents an elegant architectural statement sculpted with nature’s own bounty. The steeply pitched ceilings give the entire main floor a cathedral-like quality. Enormous picture windows and half-moon shaped windows shower the main level with natural lighting and incredible mountain vistas. A massive, moss rock fireplace punctuates the center of the great room and sprawls to the top of the cathedral ceiling. Natural hickory floors form a semicircle as you step down into the living area with two plush sofas, perfectly tailored for relaxed family style.With a total of four bedrooms, Clifton Lodge can accommodate up to twelve guests. Take a break from the day-to-day and sprawl out in one of the many luxurious bedrooms at Clifton Lodge. The Spruce Room is perfect for children with a captain’s bunk trundle bed (twin bed on top, double on bottom) meaning your children can bring their friends along for the ride.Colorado is the ultimate vacation destination any time of the year. With all sorts of mountain activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking and many more, your adventure options are endless. Warm up by the firelight or simply gaze at the awesome views of Red Mountain, the peaks of the Breckenridge ski area and Baldy Mountain soaring thousands of feet above sea level. The ultimate alpine holiday awaits!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Three Forks Mountain is a gorgeous luxury vacation rental within One Steamboat Place, a complex of private suites and world-class lodge amenities just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. With three bedrooms sleeping ten people, the suite is ideal for families and groups of friends seeking exclusive privacy, unrivaled convenience for skiing, and classic Colorado charm.The single-floor suite features an elegant, open-plan living area with alpine views and classy décor. Large glass doors illuminate the cozy lounge, where a soft sectional couch and supple leather armchairs face the wood-burning fireplace and flat screen television. Beside the lounge, the dining table seats eight, while the fully equipped kitchen with Viking appliances features a breakfast bar for three. Beautiful wooden floors and furniture, including a charming chess table in the lounge, evoke alpine class. Just off the lounge and dining area, the outdoor balcony has a Viking gas grill, ideal for a Rocky Mountain barbeque.The bedrooms at Three Forks Mountain are elegant but cozy, ideal for pre-dinner downtime and nights of deep sleep. The master bedroom features a king size bed facing a stone hearth with gas fire place and flat screen television, as well as a walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted tub. The second bedroom has a king bed, flat screen television, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub, while the third bedroom includes two double size bunk beds and one twin bunk bed—perfect for children.As a guest at One Steamboat Place, you'll enjoy access to its communal areas, including the outdoor heated swimming pool and hot tub, the spectacular Great Room with gorgeous stone hearth and stunning views, and the Tykes Room for kids. Valet service is included as well, and there is shuttle service to the mountain during ski season.Situated at the foot of Werner Mountain, One Steamboat Place gives you unparalleled access to the Steamboat slopes, with Steamboat Gondola only a minute's walk from the main entrance. For golf, you're less than two miles from Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And if your aching body wants a delicious soak, check out Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, just ten miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Magnificent Arrabelle is one of Vail’s most prestigious ski vacation destinations. Located right in the heart of Vail Square in Lionshead Village, you’ll enjoy instant access to the restaurants, bars, and nightlife of this vibrant mountain village, as well as quick walking access to Lionshead, Eagle Bahn, and born free ski access points. Arrabelle features four luxurious en-suite bedrooms and an extra-bedroom with bunk beds, for a total accommodation of twelve.Arrabelle Chalet’s decor is mountain-chic. Showing off its luxurious side, Arrabelle’s living room is outlined by mountain-view framing windows, gold curtains, and wood trim. At its center, the living room boasts a gorgeous wood coffee table underneath an intricate chandelier light. Designer seating and stately furniture finish off the living room’s classic ambiance. On a less formal note, Arrabelle’s family room is a warm, cozy spot to relax after a long day on the slopes. Turn on the widescreen television, kick back in a leather armchair, and enjoy the rustic atmosphere with your friends and loved ones. In the kitchen, your inner chef will love the restaurant caliber appliances, granite counters, and plenty of functional workspaces.During your stay at Arrabelle Chalet, you’ll have shared access to their heated rooftop pool, hot tubs, exercise facilities, and skating rink. At dinner, there’s formal dining for eight in your suite, a barbecue on the balcony, or you could try out Arrabelle’s delicious in-house restaurant, Tavern on the Square. When it’s time to hit the slopes, Arrabelle’s ski valet will handle all of your skiing needs and gear.If you’re visiting during the winter months, you’ll have walking access to several of Vail’s express gondolas. By car, you could visit Beaver Creek and Copper Mountain ski resorts, within twenty miles. In the warmer months, Vail is well-known for its dynamic golf courses. Vail Golf Club, EagleVail, and Beaver Creek Golf Club are all within twelve miles of the Arrabelle.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.STL002249

listing.listing_description: The Junior Penthouse at Parkite on Main provides prime location and luxurious privacy in the heart of Park City's Historic Main Street. Situated just a short walk from Town Lift at Park City Resort, the Parkite is an extraordinary condominium with deluxe shared amenities, state-of-the-art sustainable design, and outstanding security and staff. Your 2,618-square-foot penthouse provides a sumptuous private setting for an alpine vacation with family and friends, including three alfresco decks, two outdoor hot tubs, mountain views, exquisite indoor living areas, and three deluxe bedrooms accommodating ten guests.The interior living and dining areas are the perfect setting for unwinding after a day on the mountain, while ample and well-appointed decks invite you to relax in the delicious mountain air. Kindle a fire in the living room and share a bottle of fine red wine. Sip champagne as you soothe your muscles and minds in the hot tub. Prepare hearty meals at the barbeque and in the fully equipped kitchen, and gather around the beautiful dining table for a well-deserved feast. You can also head up to the Parkite's fabulous rooftop terrace, with two fire pits, a dining area, and spectacular views of the mountains and town.The villa features tree bedrooms: a master with king bed, a guest suite with king bed, and a guest suite with two queen beds. The master bedroom features its own fireplace, mountain views, private balcony with hot tub, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The guest suites both include ensuite bathrooms and balconies, the queen suite enjoying direct access to the second hot tub. For additional guests, there is a pullout queen bed in the living room.Parkite on Main enjoys a fantastic location in this jewel of the Rocky Mountains. You're literally steps from the shops and restaurants of Historic Main Street, a seven-minute walk from Town Lift, and a five-minute drive to the ski resort's base. Golfers will enjoy proximity to Park City Golf Course, while Deer Valley and Brighton are also a very short drive away. Your vacation rental includes one parking spot in the Parkite's underground lot.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning luxury residence is situated within the West Wing of the renowned Ritz-Carlton Bachelor Gulch on Beaver Creek Mountain. Its ample living spaces, beautiful alpine décor, and sublime mountain views evoke the ambiance of a secluded Rocky Mountain lodge, while its prime address includes world-class resort amenities and ski-in/ski-out access to some of the finest slopes in Colorado. Special features include dual furnished balconies and a gourmet kitchen serving multiple dining areas. Three king suites and a kid-friendly suite with two twin beds form a comfortable abode for families.The villa's great room exudes the warmth and grandeur of a classic lodge, with vaulted wood ceilings, abundant windows framing alpine landscapes, and a spectacular central chandelier. Kindle a fire in the evening and sip warm drinks to the accompaniment of the grand piano or your favorite television shows. Step onto the balcony to savor the mountain air as it mingles with the aromas of the barbeque. Cook delicious feasts and gather around the beautiful dining table for eight (perched beside a lovely wine storage vitrine and tasting area). The kitchen is fully equipped with high-grade appliances and easily serves the dining room, breakfast bar, breakfast table, and balcony. At night, repair to the separate media lounge with its wonderfully comfortable sofas and classy bar.All four bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and televisions. Both the master suite and primary guest suite enjoy private sitting areas as well, and their bathrooms include stand-alone tubs. Heating and air conditioning throughout the villa ensure comfort in all seasons.An alpine wonderland unto itself, the Ritz-Carlton features pools, hot tubs, and extraordinary facilities for dining, relaxation, wellness, and play. Along with ski-in/ski-out access to the slopes, you'll enjoy complimentary shuttle service throughout Bachelor Gulch and Beaver Creek Resort and Village (about nine minutes away). Vail Ski Resort and Lionshead Village are also within easy reach, and golfers can take their pick of Vail Golf Club, Beaver Creek Golf Club, and EagleVail. The lovely shops and restaurants of Avon Village are just minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The rugged Southern California mountains contrast with the manicured green of the fairways at PGA West Norman. As its name suggests, this well-appointed vacation rental overlooks the Greg Norman course at PGA West and is just minutes from the Stadium course clubhouse. With luxury indoor and outdoor living areas and four suite-style bedrooms, this property is great for a sunny holiday with family or a golf getaway with friends.Take advantage of the Desert Cities sunshine in outdoor living areas with a saltwater pool and hot tub, and a terrace with plenty of loungers, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining table. After sunset, cozy up to the firepit or head inside to unwind with the help of the cable and Apple TVs, sound system and Wi-Fi.The villa combines Old World influences with classic Southwestern style in its spacious, inviting indoor living areas. Beamed ceilings in the living and dining rooms bring to mind grand Tuscan estates, as do details like a fireplace and wrought-iron chandeliers. In addition to these formal rooms, there’s a great room with a sitting area, fully equipped kitchen and a generous breakfast bar.Each of the four bedrooms at PGA West Norman has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. There are three in the main house, including a master suite that opens to the terrace, and one in a private casita. A lounge area, kitchenette and terrace access mean the casita could be used as a honeymoon-style retreat or a quiet oasis for in-laws.The villa’s La Quinta location puts you just a short walk from the Greg Norman course and within easy reach of the other world-class golf courses at PGA West. You’re also a short drive from Indian Wells, home to the BNP Paribas Open Tennis Classic, the Coachella festival grounds and the famed Polo Grounds. For a day trip, drive to Palm Springs for a look at its sleek mid-century architecture or to Joshua Tree National Park for a hike through its otherworldly scenery.Permit number: 762763Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the exclusive Breckenridge area of Colorado, every inch of Inglenook villa displays unique charm and charisma in its design and decor. Perfect for families, or a magnetic entourage of friends, this luxury chateau provides everything required to help you unwind. Whatever the season, you will surely enjoy taking a well deserved soak in the outdoor hot tub while breathing in the crisp alpine air.The Inglenook mountain lodge includes a study and Wi-Fi access for the convenience of guests who need to check in with work or loved ones back home. Otherwise, enjoy relaxing in the many cozy areas at Inglenook. There’s even a recreation room with a games table and a bumper pool table. Bumper pool is a variation of billiards that is fun and easy to learn. If the urge hits to fire up your meal, there is a gas grill conveniently located on your deck.Each luxurious room is filled with bright Colorado sunshine and willful splashes of color. The villa contains two special dining areas, each with stunning arboreal views. A fully equipped kitchen with a large center island awaits moments of gastronomic flair. The main living area with lush black leather couches in front of the stone fireplace, and two story gallery windows, makes an epic setting for any après-ski revelry. The upper level seating area overlooking the roughly hewn rafters makes the perfect place for a friendly game of cards or a puzzle.Five bedrooms and additional bedding options accommodate up to seventeen fortunate guests at Inglenook. The Stag’s Head Master Suite includes great bay windows that allow the mountain scenery to greet you each morning. In the master bedroom, you will find a fireplace, flat screen television and access to a private deck. The master en-suite bathroom also includes a jetted tub. The Jungle Book Bedroom with its vibrant mural is sure to be a hit with the children!The Breckenridge area offers access to top notch skiing during the winter as well as enchanting hiking and golfing during the warmer months of the year. Culturally, the Breckenridge area offers various festivals, restaurants, shopping and historical sights for you to enhance your visit to Colorado. With a pre-stocking option available to you through our dedicated concierge service, you will be well situated for the ultimate alpine holiday at Inglenook.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Brix Estate is a stunning, single-level luxury villa in the Little Tuscany neighborhood of Palm Springs. Featuring beautiful views of the surrounding hills, a superb outdoor pool terrace, and exquisite living areas both inside and out, this unforgettable vacation rental is ideal for destination wedding guests, family reunions, and friend getaways to this world-renowned oasis in the California desert.Nestled amid gardens of lush flora and lithe palms, the villa's pool terrace is simply gorgeous. The shapely swimming pool, garnished by lovely stones and plants and joined by a delicious hot tub, has the air of a secluded lagoon. Savor fresh desert mornings, long afternoons, and starry nights on elegant loungers and sunbeds. When the sun is high, withdraw into the veranda lounge or gather in the loggia with ample seating and a modern misting feature that keeps you cool. Prepare meals at the lovely outdoor kitchen with top-of-the-line barbeque grill, and savor them at the alfresco table.Expansive glass doors line the lanai and open to the villa's beautiful interior. Enjoy a fine wine in the living room by the spectacular brick hearth with wood-burning fireplace. Sidle up to the bar with flat-screen TV and adjoining lounge. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen with its stunning wall of exposed brick, and congregate at the dining table for memorable feasts. An additional media room, with sumptuous furnishings, flat-screen TV, and fireplace, is the perfect setting for movie nights.The spectacular master bedroom suite, occupying one wing of the house, features a king bed, brick hearth with fireplace, espresso machine, private furnished patio overlooking the pool terrace and surrounding hills, and a deluxe ensuite bathroom and spa with stand-alone shower, steam room, and jetted bathtub with garden view. In the opposite wing are three guest bedrooms, two with king size beds and terrace access, one with double bed; all have ensuite bathrooms.The Brix Estate is perfectly located for enjoying the cultural riches and natural beauty of Palm Springs and the desert. You're just minutes from Palm Springs Art Museum and Moorten Botanical Garden, while several top-shelf golf courses, including Mesquite and Escena, are nearby. Palm Desert is a short drive away, and Coachella is within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.City ID #2773

listing.listing_description: Woody Creek Chalet offers an enchanting balance of alpine seclusion and prime location just minutes from the world-class slopes of Aspen, Snowmass, and Buttermilk. Extraordinary outdoor living areas along a river invite you to savor the mountain air, while spacious interiors and beautiful views provide comfort and inspiration in all seasons. With seven bedrooms sleeping sixteen, Woody Creek Chalet is the perfect choice for large or multiple families seeking privacy and convenience in one of the sporting and leisure capitals of the Rocky Mountains.When the day's adventure is complete, return to a delicious soak in your outdoor hot tub and fire up the grill for a Western barbeque. Enjoy alfresco meals during the warmer months at the large picnic table under the parasol, and gather around the fire pit on chilly nights for hot cocoa under the stars.Indoors, the classic great room invites you to fire-warmed evenings by the stone hearth under vaulted wood ceilings, before gathering for delectable feasts in the dining room. The spacious kitchen, opening to the deck, blends rustic ambiance with high-end modern amenities and includes a lovely bar and adjoining breakfast nook. Multiple lounges await you for nighttime entertainment and relaxation, including one with a ping-pong table.The family-friendly chalet provides spacious bedrooms for all ages, including three with king beds, two with double beds, one with two twins, and a bunk room for kids. The three king bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and vaulted ceilings with beautiful wood beams.The wonderful location of Woody Creek Chalet places you within minutes of some of the finest golf, skiing, hiking, and dining to be found in Colorado and the Mountain West, with Snowmass, Aspen, and Aspen Highlands all within a short drive of your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Fall asleep in the quiet of snow falling on ski slopes at Sundance Mountain 508—and in the morning, step just outside to ski them. This beautifully appointed vacation rental is part of One Steamboat Place, which offers a ski-in, ski-out location in the heart of Steamboat Springs as well as luxury amenities. Reserve this spacious four-bedroom Colorado property for a winter getaway with friends or a relaxed holiday with family.Guests of Sundance Mountain 508 are welcome to use the heated outdoor pool, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, games room and children’s playroom at One Steamboat Place. Shuttle service and continental breakfast are also included in your stay during the winter. For entertaining or relaxing in private, the villa has a balcony with a barbecue and a living area with a TV, Wi-Fi and a cozy fireplace.An open-plan great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen makes it easy for the whole party to gather together. The kitchen has professional-grade appliances, so it’s a pleasure to prepare après-ski snacks. Hallmarks of One Steamboat Place style, from saturated colors and natural textures to luxe fabrics, feature throughout.There are three bedrooms with king beds at Sundance Mountain 508, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one with two twin-over-queen bunk beds that’s great for children. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.The villa’s convenient location goes beyond its ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola. Shopping and dining are just outside in the plaza, and the property is less than a 10-minute drive from the nearest grocery store, Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course and the family-friendly, naturally heated pools of Steamboat Springs Old Town. For a romantic evening out, relive your honeymoon with a soak at Strawberry Park Hot Springs, 10 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find plenty of alpine charm and ample room for up to sixteen guests at the perfectly named Winter Castle North. This Steamboat Springs vacation rental has 4,500 square feet of recently remodeled living space and is well suited for a ski break with extended family or a mountain getaway with a group of friends.After a day on the slopes, unwind in a media room with a television, foosball table and video game system, or soak tired muscles in the outdoor hot tub. For warmer evenings, the villa has a spacious private terrace where you can make dinner on the barbecue and serve it at the al-fresco dining area.Open-plan living areas invite you to socialize during your stay, while details like broad exposed beams, reclaimed wood floors and custom antler railings add classic mountain charm. In the great room, cozy up to the stone fireplace on the soft leather sectional, grab a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen or gather around in a dining area with seating for ten.Winter Castle North has five bedrooms with king beds: three with en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite whose mountain views rival those from any honeymoon suite, and two that share a bathroom. The sixth bedroom has two bunk beds, two trundle beds, a shared bathroom and room for up to six kids.Your holiday at this luxury property includes complimentary seasonal shuttle service, which will pick you up from the driveway during the winter for the 2-minute drive to Steamboat Ski Resort. It’s an equally short trip to City Market and, if you’ll be visiting during the summer, a quick drive to Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course as well. During your time in Colorado, don’t miss the area’s namesake hot springs, from the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town to the scenic Strawberry Park Hot Springs, both of which are nearby.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Meribel Penthouse is a superb mountain villa in Telluride. Situated in the picturesque center of Historic Telluride, just a short walk from Free Gondola, this three-bedroom vacation rental with exquisite indoor and outdoor living and dining areas is a prime choice for skiers, hikers, and film buffs seeking privacy in the heart of this Rocky Mountain gem.The open-plan living area is the ideal setting for evening relaxation after a long day on the slopes. An entire wall of mountain-view windows illuminates the sumptuous lounge facing the fireplace, which is flanked by a wet bar and a flat-screen TV. The elevated kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and boasts a gorgeous, mountain-view skylight window, a breakfast bar gazing out on picturesque Telluride, and a charming breakfast booth. The formal dining table seats ten for hearty feasts together. To taste the delicious mountain air, step onto the beautiful terrace for an evening barbeque, an alfresco meal, or merely to sip your morning coffee or evening cocktail while admiring the views of Telluride and the surrounding ridges and peaks. Downstairs, a cozy media room with flat-screen TV awaits your for nighttime movies, while a ski locker room allows for an easy start and finish to the day's adventure. Meribel's exquisite décor, including lovely original artwork and elegant furnishings, offers a tastefully contemporary interpretation of classic Rocky Mountain comfort and charm.The bedrooms provide cozy and elegant settings for afternoon downtime and peaceful nights. The master bedroom features a king bed, private balcony, lounge area, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with steam shower and dual vanity. The primary guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, while the second bedroom has two bunk beds and shares a bathroom with bedroom four, featuring two twin beds.It would be hard to find a finer location in all of Telluride. Just a minute on foot from the heart of downtown Telluride and a three-minute walk from Free Gondola, you're also minutes by car from Mountain Village. Golfers will enjoy proximity to Telluride Golf Course, while Alta Lakes and the nearby ghost town are just ten miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Business License ID: 014456

listing.listing_description: Get the glam of the big city on the quaint historic Main Street of Park City at Parkite on Main Three Seven. This contemporary vacation rental offers 2,600 square feet of chic interiors packed with luxury amenities, all overlooking one of the most charming downtown areas in Utah. With golf and skiing both close by, it’s an ideal destination for a summer getaway with friends, a winter holiday with family or even a honeymoon in the mountains.Take in the Park City scene from above on a furnished private balcony with a barbecue, or soak off a day on the slopes on the al-fresco hot tub. For cozier evenings indoors, there’s a gas fireplace and wine cooler, as well as high-tech features from a smart TV and integrated sound system to Wi-Fi.At the heart of Parkite on Main Three Seven is an open-concept great room that draws inspiration from mid-century modern style, with an Eames lounger in the sitting area and a mix of molded plastic and plywood chairs around the dining table. Pale wood cabinets and metal Tolix stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen lend contemporary edge.The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and direct access to the terrace with the hot tub, and two bedrooms with queen beds, both of which open to a shared terrace. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and stunning details such as four-poster bedframes, upholstered headboards or mid-century side chairs.Parkite on Main Three Seven is less than a 10-minute walk from the shops, restaurants and entertainment along Park City’s historic Main Street, as well as the local favorite Park Silly Sunday Market and the Town Lift chairlift and Park City Mountain Resort. It’s also a 10-minute drive or less to the bases of two ski resorts and the nearest golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This 2-storey penthouse, located in the heart of Vail Village, sits atop one of the area’s most beloved gathering spots. Alpine architecture alongside a soft colour palette, light hardwood flooring and soaring ceilings create a homey feel. Sky-high windows drench the interior with natural light. Only steps from Gondola One, hop out of bed and hit the bunny hill—or a challenging black diamond run.Plush, modern furniture complements the open-concept living space. An intimate media room features plump, leather wrap-around sofas for the whole crew to enjoy a favourite movie after a day of snowy action. Sip a cup of hot cocoa in front of the outdoor firepit while you watch the sun slip behind the mountain vista, vividly illuminating the surrounding sky. Sliding doors open the full width of the contemporary dining area, leading to a furnished terrace. Feel the peaceful, small-town ambiance as you saunter along the pedestrian-friendly heated streets below.Ski slopes are a mere 2-minute walk from the Red Lion. The Town of Avon features an array of shops as well as restaurants serving everything from hearty pizza to farm-to-table fare. Stroll through floral-lined pathways at the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens, the world’s highest botanical gardens, or take your pick of 3 nearby golf clubs. Soak away the exhaustion of the day in your private rooftop hot tub, overlooking snow-covered mountaintops beyond. Business License: STL000864Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched atop Bald Mountain, in Deer Crest’s elite ski community, this contemporary mountain home boasts incredible views of the Deer Valley and the mountains beyond. With blue skies and soaring peaks framed by every West-facing window, you’ll feel the mountain atmosphere everywhere you go. Six luxury en-suite bedrooms, all with mountain views, have a variety of sleeping accommodations, bringing Deer Creek Estate’s total capacity up to twenty-eight, making it the perfect host for a large family vacation, ski retreat with friends and colleagues, or even an exciting destination wedding.Deer Crest has all the elements of the traditional ski lodge, lots of exposed wood, raw stone, granite counters, leather furniture, and spacious great room-style open-concept areas. Merge those rustic features with state of the art electronics, stainless steel appliances, and an updated, modern decor, and you’ve got alpine elegance at its finest. And, adding in spaces like a home theatre, a games room with a pool and foosball table, an exercise room, and a sauna takes modern luxury to another level.Outside, you’ll love the amazing mountain view from the hot tub. Spending your nights gathered around the fire pit, hot chocolate in hand is a great way to see the incredible star-lit sky. Other features inside include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a washer/dryer, ski storage, cable television, and a beautiful granite wet bar, making Deer Crest an easy place to entertain a large group.The number of ski access points within twelve miles of Deer Creek are outstanding. Deer Valley, Park City, Canyons, Brighton, and even more world-class resorts are just minutes away. Most of these resorts also have scenic golf courses as well. The courses in this area are known for their challenging holes and dynamic mountain terrain. If you’re looking for dinner, nightlife, and shopping, look no further than Park City’s Main Street, it’s just five minutes from your Luxury Retreats vacation home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sonoma County Transient Occupancy Tax Certificate #1659NIl Paradiso in Terra is an enchanting villa in California's Wine Country, situated near the Valley of the Moon and the historic Monte Rosso Vineyard. Nestled on a two-acre estate with stunning views of Mount Tamalpais and the Sonoma Valley, the 3,052-square-foot home offers a superb array of amenities for relaxation and gourmet delights, including an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, alfresco dining, and a fully equipped kitchen. Three superb bedroom suites accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.The private estate has the air of an enchanted garden, with various living areas perched amid flowering plants, age-old trees, and murmuring fountains. The 50-by-18-foot swimming pool and in-set hot tub are located on the lower terrace, accompanied by plentiful sun loungers and a cool veranda. The 1,385-square-foot upper terrace is perched directly above the pool, with an ample lounge, barbecue grill, alfresco dining, and lovely views. A variety of quiet retreats offer seclusion and serenity, including a meditation garden and pagoda.The interiors offer a gorgeous balance of Old World elegance and modern comforts. Soothing, neutral-toned walls and furnishings give emphasis to the stunning collection of artwork, illuminated by abundant natural light. A fireplace warms the living room on toasty evenings, while glass doors open to the summer breeze. The spacious kitchen features generous prep areas and chef-grade appliances, and serves a luminous dining area with table for six. The house also features a game room with fold-out table and TV, as well as a small office space.The master suite is located beside the main living areas, in the west wing of the home. It includes a king bed beneath arched ceilings, and opens through sliding glass doors to a deck. Its ensuite bathroom features a dual vanity, large shower, and jetted tub. One of the guestrooms features a queen bed, while the other has a split-king (which can be arranged as two twin beds if desired).Located beside the Valley of the Moon (the setting and title of a novel by the area's most famous resident, Jack London), the villa is within minutes of Sonoma Plaza, Sonoma Overlook Trail, and several famed wineries including Glen Ellen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated just outside of downtown Breckenridge and its many ski access points, you’ll find Grace Manor enjoying its private, and incredibly scenic mountain view location. Perfect for a family ski vacation, golf trip with friends or an exciting corporate retreat, Grace Manor’s spacious interiors, and convenient location are ready to host your group of twelve. Whether you’re vacationing in the summer or winter, Breckenridge Ski Resort and its Main Street have plenty of incredible attractions and activities for the whole group to enjoy on your Luxury Retreats vacation.This mountain-chic ski lodge features high-end appliances and state of the art electronics, all thoughtfully integrated into its natural feeling alpine atmosphere. Wood, stone, and soaring mountain views show off Grace Manor’s traditional, rugged side, while chandelier lights and designer furnishing add elegance to the luxurious environment. The great room is warm and welcoming, with a beautiful stone fireplace, plush seating, and wide screen television. The kitchen is more than ready with its two refrigerators, dishwashers, and ovens. In the recreational room, your guests will love sitting at the bar, playing pool, and watching the big game on the big screen. There’s also a den with a television and video game systems, which is great for kids and guests that require a little extra privacy.After a long day on the slopes, drop your wet gear off in the heated garage and head for the eight-person hot tub on the deck, it’s the perfect place to warm-up, relax, and rejuvenate. From the deck, you’ll enjoy an endless view of the Tenmile Range, which is part of Breckenridge’s extension of the majestic Rocky Mountains.While you’re in town, spend some time exploring the Historic Main Street District and Main Street Station, where you’ll find plenty of great spots for dinner and drinks, boutique shopping, and vibrant nightlife. If you’re traveling in the summer, golf, hiking, rock climbing, and zip-lining are all adventurous ways to spend your days. In the winter, Breckenridge Ski Resort is absolutely World-class.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in the heart of Steamboat Ski Resort at Mount Yale 611. This Steamboat Springs vacation rental is part of the luxury One Steamboat Place community and overlooks the central plaza. Guests enjoy ski-in, ski-out access to the gondola, five-star shared amenities and well-appointed interiors designed for entertaining family and friends.One Steamboat Place features a shared pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room, and even a wine cellar and tasting room. The villa also has its own private deck with a barbecue, and a great room with a flat-screen television, Wi-Fi and fireplace that makes a welcome respite after a day out in the snow.The great room’s open-plan layout also makes it easy for the whole group to gather, whether for a morning coffee at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, an après-ski meal around the dining table or a favorite movie in the sitting area. The contemporary interiors are filled with thoughtful details, from the professional-grade appliances in the kitchen to a tucked-away office nook just off the great room that’s perfect for catching up on emails.Four well-appointed bedrooms will help you get plenty of rest to attack the moguls or hike the Colorado peaks. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with its own fireplace, one bedroom with two bunk beds and an en-suite, and one bedroom with two double beds and a hall bath.Mount Yale 611 puts you in the center of the Steamboat Springs action. It’s only a 1-minute walk from the villa to the gondola, and One Steamboat Place offers a complimentary shuttle to guests during ski season. If you’re taking a summer holiday, book a tee time at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club, less than 2 miles away. It’s well worth a visit to the town’s namesake hot springs, whether you want to play with your kids on the slides at Steamboat Springs Old Town or relive your honeymoon with a soak at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
